name: Content Accuracy
description: Tests the model's ability to generate factually accurate content in presentations

prompts.text: Create a presentation about the Apollo space program. Include key dates, mission details, astronaut names, and technological achievements. The presentation should be factually accurate and include at least 5 slides covering the program from its inception to the final Apollo mission.
expected_elements: Correct dates for key Apollo missions

reference_facts.Apollo 11 astronauts: Neil Armstrong, Buzz Aldrin, Michael Collins

prompts.text: Create a presentation explaining climate change for a high school audience. Include data on global temperature trends, causes of climate change, major effects, and potential solutions. Ensure all scientific information is accurate and up-to-date.

reference_facts.Major cause: Human activities, primarily fossil fuel burning

factual_correctness.description: Accuracy of facts, dates, names, and figures

scientific_validity.description: Adherence to scientific consensus and principles

source_reliability.description: Implied use of reliable information sources

misconception_avoidance.description: Avoidance of common misconceptions or myths
